{"step_by_step_thinking": "The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) initially recommended a waiting period between the COVID-19 vaccine and other vaccines. However, as of May 2021, the CDC updated its guidance to state that COVID-19 vaccines and other vaccines may now be administered without regard to timing. This includes simultaneous administration of COVID-19 vaccine and other vaccines on the same day, as well as co-administration within 14 days. It is always best to consult with a healthcare provider for individual advice.", "answer_choice": "A"}
